content: Por cierto, nos toman por gilipollas y nosotros nos las tragamos dobladas. Hay una plaga de insectos. Te ofrecen un repelente que ahuyenta, pero no mata porque así es "respetuoso con el ecosistema". Justo al principio, te dicen que esos insectos se mueven poco. Si no mata, el bicho se va de la cama. ¿Dónde se va? Puede que fuera de casa, o puede que no. No olvidemos dejar la llave en un sitio adecuado por si acaso. ¿Hasta cuándo se va? Hasta que se pase el efecto. Luego vuelve.

content: Also, there seems to be a disconnect in the way millennials interact with established artists from previous generations. Instead of admiration, reverence, there's a tendency to appropriate their work/ideas. This begs the question: why the audacity to challenge or reinterpret the work of proven talent? Perhaps this is due to the relationship between millennials & their baby boomer parents. If boomers were more permissive, less authoritative, did it curtail the fiery spirit of their offspring?

content: Por cierto, nos toman por gilipollas y nosotros nos las tragamos dobladas. Hay una plaga de insectos. Te ofrecen un repelente que ahuyenta, pero no mata porque así es "respetuoso con el ecosistema". Justo al principio, te dicen que esos insectos se mueven poco. Si no mata, el bicho se va de la cama. ¿Dónde se va? Puede que fuera de casa, o puede que no. No olvidemos dejar la llave en un sitio adecuado por si acaso. ¿Hasta cuándo se va? Hasta que se pase el efecto. Luego vuelve.

content: Also, there seems to be a disconnect in the way millennials interact with established artists from previous generations. Instead of admiration, reverence, there's a tendency to appropriate their work/ideas. This begs the question: why the audacity to challenge or reinterpret the work of proven talent? Perhaps this is due to the relationship between millennials & their baby boomer parents. If boomers were more permissive, less authoritative, did it curtail the fiery spirit of their offspring?

content: I was once told "stop working on this product" we are killing it. I was an interaction designer. That product was my everything at the time. I was told, "go to the beach" (the real beach, not the bench) and "don't start anything new now that you'd have to maintain later." It really hurt. I acted out and tried to convince my company to save it. I failed at that, and the thing went away. It was for the best though since no one bought it. I was in a bubble. I should have known the numbers.

I was talking to a coworker about 3D printers and started watching some reviews, and after years of fence sitting, I’ve finally ordered one.

content:
Covid's Damage Lingers in the Heart
----
- 23 minutes ago | 21 points | 4 comments
- URL: https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/covids-damage-lingers-heart
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37999349
- Summary: The effects of COVID-19 on the cardiovascular system are being increasingly recognized by researchers. COVID-19 can cause cardiac injuries, heart attacks, and myocarditis, and can also lead to lingering cardiovascular symptoms such as abnormal heartbeats, dizziness, and shortness of breath. People with pre-existing cardiovascular risk factors are especially at risk. Postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS), a condition that causes abnormal heart rates, has also been associated with COVID-19. Understanding the cardiovascular effects of COVID-19 is important for developing better treatments.

content: I was once told "stop working on this product" we are killing it. I was an interaction designer. That product was my everything at the time. I was told, "go to the beach" (the real beach, not the bench) and "don't start anything new now that you'd have to maintain later." It really hurt. I acted out and tried to convince my company to save it. I failed at that, and the thing went away. It was for the best though since no one bought it. I was in a bubble. I should have known the numbers.

content:
Covid's Damage Lingers in the Heart
----
- 23 minutes ago | 21 points | 4 comments
- URL: https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/covids-damage-lingers-heart
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37999349
- Summary: The effects of COVID-19 on the cardiovascular system are being increasingly recognized by researchers. COVID-19 can cause cardiac injuries, heart attacks, and myocarditis, and can also lead to lingering cardiovascular symptoms such as abnormal heartbeats, dizziness, and shortness of breath. People with pre-existing cardiovascular risk factors are especially at risk. Postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS), a condition that causes abnormal heart rates, has also been associated with COVID-19. Understanding the cardiovascular effects of COVID-19 is important for developing better treatments.

content: I was once told "stop working on this product" we are killing it. I was an interaction designer. That product was my everything at the time. I was told, "go to the beach" (the real beach, not the bench) and "don't start anything new now that you'd have to maintain later." It really hurt. I acted out and tried to convince my company to save it. I failed at that, and the thing went away. It was for the best though since no one bought it. I was in a bubble. I should have known the numbers.

content:
Covid's Damage Lingers in the Heart
----
- 23 minutes ago | 21 points | 4 comments
- URL: https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/covids-damage-lingers-heart
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37999349
- Summary: The effects of COVID-19 on the cardiovascular system are being increasingly recognized by researchers. COVID-19 can cause cardiac injuries, heart attacks, and myocarditis, and can also lead to lingering cardiovascular symptoms such as abnormal heartbeats, dizziness, and shortness of breath. People with pre-existing cardiovascular risk factors are especially at risk. Postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS), a condition that causes abnormal heart rates, has also been associated with COVID-19. Understanding the cardiovascular effects of COVID-19 is important for developing better treatments.

content: I was once told "stop working on this product" we are killing it. I was an interaction designer. That product was my everything at the time. I was told, "go to the beach" (the real beach, not the bench) and "don't start anything new now that you'd have to maintain later." It really hurt. I acted out and tried to convince my company to save it. I failed at that, and the thing went away. It was for the best though since no one bought it. I was in a bubble. I should have known the numbers.

content:
Covid's Damage Lingers in the Heart
----
- 23 minutes ago | 21 points | 4 comments
- URL: https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/covids-damage-lingers-heart
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37999349
- Summary: The effects of COVID-19 on the cardiovascular system are being increasingly recognized by researchers. COVID-19 can cause cardiac injuries, heart attacks, and myocarditis, and can also lead to lingering cardiovascular symptoms such as abnormal heartbeats, dizziness, and shortness of breath. People with pre-existing cardiovascular risk factors are especially at risk. Postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS), a condition that causes abnormal heart rates, has also been associated with COVID-19. Understanding the cardiovascular effects of COVID-19 is important for developing better treatments.

content:
Covid's Damage Lingers in the Heart
----
- 23 minutes ago | 21 points | 4 comments
- URL: https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/covids-damage-lingers-heart
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37999349
- Summary: The effects of COVID-19 on the cardiovascular system are being increasingly recognized by researchers. COVID-19 can cause cardiac injuries, heart attacks, and myocarditis, and can also lead to lingering cardiovascular symptoms such as abnormal heartbeats, dizziness, and shortness of breath. People with pre-existing cardiovascular risk factors are especially at risk. Postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome (POTS), a condition that causes abnormal heart rates, has also been associated with COVID-19. Understanding the cardiovascular effects of COVID-19 is important for developing better treatments.

Ils ont identifié pas moins de 35 « signaux vitaux planétaires », parmi lesquels 20 atteignent aujourd'hui des niveaux records.

« La vie sur la planète Terre est en état de siège », écrivent des scientifiques, qui préviennent que « nous entrons dorénavant dans une zone inexplorée ». Dans un article publié le 24 octobre dans la revue BioScience, une équipe internationale de chercheurs lance un nouveau cri d'alarme sur l'état écologique général de la planète et sa viabilité pour le vivant.
Ils ont identifié pas moins de 35 « signaux vitaux planétaires », parmi lesquels 20 atteignent aujourd'hui des niveaux records.

La vie sur Terre est « en état de siège », alertent les scientifiques
https://reporterre.net/La-vie-sur-Terre-est-en-etat-de-siege-alertent-les-scientifiques
« La vie sur la planète Terre est en état de siège », écrivent des scientifiques, qui préviennent que « nous entrons dorénavant dans une zone inexplorée ». Dans un article publié le 24 octobre dans la revue BioScience, une équipe internationale de chercheurs lance un nouveau cri d'alarme sur l'état écologique général de la planète et sa viabilité pour le vivant.
Ils ont identifié pas moins de 35 « signaux vitaux planétaires », parmi lesquels 20 atteignent aujourd'hui des niveaux records.
Ils notent par exemple que (...)

Ils ont identifié pas moins de 35 « signaux vitaux planétaires », parmi lesquels 20 atteignent aujourd'hui des niveaux records.

« La vie sur la planète Terre est en état de siège », écrivent des scientifiques, qui préviennent que « nous entrons dorénavant dans une zone inexplorée ». Dans un article publié le 24 octobre dans la revue BioScience, une équipe internationale de chercheurs lance un nouveau cri d'alarme sur l'état écologique général de la planète et sa viabilité pour le vivant.
Ils ont identifié pas moins de 35 « signaux vitaux planétaires », parmi lesquels 20 atteignent aujourd'hui des niveaux records.
Ils notent par exemple que (...)

content:
Toteutimme Lounais-Hämeen koulutuskuntayhtymälle WordPress Multisite -ympäristön, jossa on helppo hallita useampaa WordPress-sivustoa. Sivustolle suunniteltiin yhteiset elementit instansseille siten, että instansseilla on myös omat yksilölliset tunnisteensa.

Asiakkaan palaute:

"Nopeaa toimintaa, vahvaa tekemistä, ketterää reagointia ja hurttia huumoria – niistä on yhteistyö Dudelaisten kanssa tehty! Haave käyttäjäystävällisestä multisite-toteutuksesta onnistui yli odotusten ja olemme varsin tyytyväisiä lopputulokseen. Ja koska nettisivuthan eivät ole koskaan valmiit, on hienoa että juuri nämä rautaiset asiantuntijat ovat jatkossakin kehitystyön kumppaneitamme."

Lue koko referenssitarina sivuiltamme: https://www.dude.fi/toitamme/lounais-hameen-koulutuskuntayhtyma

#Verkkosivut #WPFI #Työnäytteet #DigitoimistoDude

account.note:
Dude on digitoimisto, joka osaa hommansa. Suunnittelemme naurettavan hyviä WordPress-verkkosivustoja. 100% palvelua, 0% jargonia.

Tuuttailemme ainakin aiheista #verkkosivut, #wpfi, #saavutettavuus, #webdevfi, #avoinlähdekoodi.

Toteuttamiamme verkkopalveluita: https://www.dude.fi/toitamme
Avoimet työpaikat: https://www.dude.fi/tyopaikat

content:
Başkasıyla hesaplaşmak kolay.
Gel de kendinle hesaplaş!
Hayallerin arzun anlamın nerelerdeydi, sevdiklerin kimlerdi, onlara o aralar neler hissetmişti.
Sen o zamanlar neyin kimden nasıl gelmesini arzu etmiştin de bunu talep ettmek aklına bile gelmedi. Talep etmeyi akıl edip de ettiklerinin hangileri karşılandı, hangileri beklentisiz karşılıksız geldi de sen o sıra başka hesabın peşinde olduğun için geleni göremedin, lütfedileni kabul ed(e)medin....
Şu an anlamın aklın arzun canlılığın nerede?
